# testPackage

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of testPackage is to create an r package.


## Installation

You can install the released version of testPackage from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("testPackage")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("kianwazzu/testPackage")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to see a dog:

```{r example}
library(testPackage)
see_a_dog()
```
